thread.section_title: Texaselectricrates Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Texaselectricrates | texaselectricrates.com
thread.title: Jeffry Tafoya

author: Jeffry Tafoya
title: Jeffry Tafoya
text:
Ashley was very helpful and patient and answered all of my questions. And I had many questions. If this turns out like I expect, I don't know why anyone would shop themselves, unless you are "in the know." Very informative and she helped me get a plan to fit my needs. Single person in a 1 bed 900 sf apartment gone from 7 to 7 Mon thru Fri. I recommend to call and use this service. Time saver!!!
Jeff
